code: import React,{useContext}from'react';import noteContext from"../context/notes/noteContex";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Noteitem=function Noteitem(props){var context=useContext(noteContext);var DeleteNote=context.DeleteNote;var note=props.note,updateNote=props.updateNote;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-md-3",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"card my-3",style:{background:'#ed49e9'},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card-body",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{className:"card-title",style:{textDecoration:"underline"},children:note.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"card-text",children:note.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-trash mx-2",onClick:function onClick(){DeleteNote(note._id);props.showAlert("Deleted Successfully","success");}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-solid fa-pen-to-square mx-2",onClick:function onClick(){updateNote(note);}})]})})});};export default Noteitem;

sourcesContent:
import React,{useContext} from 'react' import noteContext from "../context/notes/noteContex" const Noteitem = (props) => { const context = useContext(noteContext) const { DeleteNote } = context const { note , updateNote } = props return (
{note.title}

{note.description}

{DeleteNote(note._id) ;props.showAlert("Deleted Successfully","success")}}> {updateNote(note);}}>
) } export default Noteitem
